description: The targets are observations that can be used to evaluate and build forecasts.  We provide the code to access different targets as an asset.
title: Targets

table:columns.name: duration
table:columns.description: temporal duration of target (hourly = PT1H, daily = P1D, etc.); follows ISO 8601 duration convention

2.title: Aquatics Target Access
2.description:
This R code will return results for the relevant targets file.

### R

```{r}
# Use code below

url <- "https://sdsc.osn.xsede.org/bio230014-bucket01/challenges/targets/project_id=neon4cast/duration=P1D/aquatics-targets.csv.gz"
targets <- readr::read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```
